title: Configure your S3 containers so you can use them in your AI products
datastoreAlert: You’ll need an S3 user (Object Storage operator) to use S3 containers. To create your S3 datastore, you need your S3 container’s access_key and secret_key.
datastoreParagraphe2: With datastores, you can configure all the necessary elements to connect your AI products to your S3 containers.
datastoreParagraphe3: S3 datastores are specific to AI products.
formDatastoreErrorMaxLength: Please enter a maximum of {{max}} characters
formDatastoreNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores and dashes, and must not start with a dash.
formDatastoreToastSuccessDescription: Your S3 datastore has been added
formDatastoreToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred adding your S3 datastore
deleteDatastoreDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ alias }} datastore?
deleteDatastoreToastErrorTitle: An error has occurred deleting your datastore
deleteDatastoreToastSuccessDescription: The {{ alias }} datastore has been deleted
